name: Polyventure
description: Polyventure: a low poly adventure, is a game based on beautiful atmospheres and lucid dreaming, to concern about endangered species and the enviroment. The game mainly consists to explore and feel the surrounding environment of a fantastic world. A magnificent experimental game made to delight your sensory system.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: Compatible with SSE2 instruction set. Memory: 50 MB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with level 9.3 capability capabilities. Storage: 50 MB available space
